import React from 'react' import './ProductDisplay.css' import star_icon from '../Assets/star_icon.png' import star_dull_icon from '../Assets/star_dull_icon.png' const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const {product} = props; if (!product || !product.image) { return null; } return (

{product.name}

${product.old_price}
${product.new_price}
ahdhahdhadhadhahd

Category:Women,Tshirt,Croptop Category:Modern,Latest
) } export default ProductDisplay
